title: Lion Rollerball Pen
description:
Pen developed from Edward Kemeys’ Lions, 1893, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection

Feel inspired when you put your words to paper with this elegant pen. This rollerball pen has a screw on cap, is refillable with Schmidt P 900 M cartridges and comes in a gift box. (Refill not included.)

  • Pen Dimension:  5.5 in. 
  • Pen Box Dimensions:  6.25 x 1.5 x 1 in.
  • Ink Color: Black.
  • Materials: Solid brass barrel.
